strapiPost.title: Don't Miss Kids Day At The Rogers Local Food Market
strapiPost.topic: Sponsored by Rogers Local Food Market
strapiPost.content:
Rogers Local Food Market will host Kids Day this Saturday, May 20, from 9a-12p, including kid-friendly activities like a scavenger hunt, veggie tasting, and more.

  • Healthy habits: Kids Day is hosted in partnership with UAMS and Apple Seeds, and kids will receive vouchers to shop with so they can experience buying fresh, local food for themselves, like the sweet in-season strawberries from McGarrah’s Farm.
  • Good neighbors: Open on Saturdays from 8a-1p, Rogers Local Food Market welcomes and welcomes and doubles SNAP, Senior Farmers Market Nutrition Program vouchers, and WIC Farmers Market vouchers – because healthy local foods should be affordable for everyone!

Follow Rogers Local Food Market on Facebook and Instagram for updates, and find an interactive market map online HERE.
